rows.label: tlk42450111_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Koikoi always seem to be falling
in love with Drivers.

rows.label: tlk42450111_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Drivers all very cool and collected,
so heart of Koikoi go pitter-pat.

rows.label: tlk42450111_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Koikoi want to make self very
beautiful by equip accessory...

rows.label: tlk42450111_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Then buy Core Chips for
lovely Driver...

rows.label: tlk42450111_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Collect many collectibles for
make great Assist Core...

rows.label: tlk42450111_02_msg0006
rows.name:
And stand by Driver through many
trial, watch Blade grow stronger!

rows.label: tlk42450111_02_msg0008
rows.name:
Meh-meh?! Koikoi talk so long that lots
customer arrive! Must go back to work!
